name: Rancor
description: Large, carnivorous reptilian creature with immense strength and size, often used as a beast of combat.

name: Wampa
description: Snow-dwelling predator with white fur and sharp claws, known for attacking unwary travelers on Hoth.

name: Sarlacc
description: Immense, carnivorous plant-like creature living in the Great Pit of Carkoon, slowly digesting its prey over centuries.

name: Acklay
description: Large, insectoid creature with sharp claws and a deadly tail, used in Geonosian arenas for combat.

name: Dianoga
description: Giant, tentacled monster typically found in garbage compactors, with a single eye atop its stalk.

name: Krayt Dragon
description: Massive, reptilian predator native to Tatooine, feared by locals for its size and ferocity.

name: Nexu
description: Agile, feline creature with sharp teeth and claws, often used as a hunting beast.

name: Varactyl
description: Lizard-like creature known for its climbing abilities and loyalty, native to Utapau.

name: Mynock
description: Bat-like creature that feeds on energy, often found in space aboard starships and asteroids.

name: Womp Rat
description: Rodent-like creature known for its scavenging habits and sometimes aggressive behavior.

name: Dewback
description: Reptilian mount used by the inhabitants of Tatooine, adapted to desert environments.

name: Razorcrest
description: Armed starship piloted by bounty hunters, equipped with advanced weaponry and stealth technology.

name: Gizka
description: Small, amphibious creatures known for their rapid reproduction and ability to infest starships.

name: Rakghoul
description: Mutated humanoid creature infected by a virus, aggressive and dangerous.
